title: Season rewards didint recived yet
body:
Im gold 5 and i still didint recived mine gold icon border and skin and its passed 3 days alredy and evry one in my friend list recived it only i am waiting for it {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}} 
1 of my frriends says if i was baned this seasone i dont recive rewards but idk if its rue or not so pls answer me about this

replies.body: We recently ran another wave of rewards, so everything should be good to go now.  If you still don't have your rewards, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We're happy to look at your issue individually!

Well ty but i think its about ban that i heaved on mine account in september that i erned  by letting mine friend play on mine account when i was on summer vacation, if its some way for me to fix that and get mine rewards i can post ticket and you can look matches from than and see
